evelution-theme: Labal that appears on each item on the theme selection dropdown.
evelution-themes: Tooltip label used for the themes dropdown.
evelution-explore: Tooltip label used for the explore dropdown.
evelution-togglesize: Tooltip label used for toggling article width and rail visibility.
evelution-togglecolor: Tooltip label used for toggling the color mode between solo and duo.
evelution-newfiles: Tooltip label used for the new files link.
evelution-darkmode: Tooltip label used for switching to Dark mode.
evelution-lightmode: Tooltip label used for switching to Light mode.
evelution-variants: Tooltip label used for the language variants dropdown.
evelution-support: Tooltip label used for the support server link.
evelution-documentation: Tooltip label used for the documentation link.
evelution-standard: Label for the standard visual style and color pack.
evelution-visual-styles: Tooltip label used for the visual styles dropdown.
evelution-visual-colors: Tooltip label used for the visual colors dropdown.
evelution-activity-module:
{{notranslate}}
This message contains the required wikitext to embed Special:RecentChanges.
evelution-about-module-info:
{{notranslate}}
This message contains info about the wiki.
evelution-style-basic: Label used for the Basic visual style.
evelution-style-contrast: Label used for the High contrast visual style.
evelution-style-simple: Label used for the Simple visual style.
evelution-style-classic: Label used for the Classic visual style.
evelution-color-factorycolors: Label used for the Factory color scheme
evelution-color-lunacolors:
{{optional}}
Label used for the XP luna color scheme
evelution-color-classicforced: Label used for the Windows forced color scheme
evelution-color-campbellforced: Label used for the Campbell forced color scheme
evelution-color-forced: Label used for the Evelution OS forced color scheme
evelution-color-tangoforced: Label used for the Tango forced color scheme
evelution-color-rgbcolors: Label used for the RGB celebration color scheme
evelution-color-retro:
{{optional}}
Label used for the Retro color schemes
evelution-color-fandomcolors:
{{optional}}
Label used for the Fandom color schemes
evelution-color-candycrush:
{{optional}}
Label used for the Candy crush color schemes
evelution-color-discord:
{{optional}}
Label used for the Discord color scheme
evelution-designer-title: Title used for the CPE Theme Designer
evelution-designer-copy: Label used for the Copy theme code button
evelution-designer-paste: Label used for the Paste current theme button
evelution-designer-clear: Lavel used for the End testing button
evelution-designer-test: Label used for the Test theme button
evelution-designer-apply: Label used for the Apply theme button
evelution-designer-body: Label used for the Body section of Theme Designer
evelution-designer-auto: Label used for the Automatic option of Theme Designer
evelution-designer-other: Label used for the Other section of Theme Designer
evelution-designer-community: Label used for the Community Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-image: Label used for the Community Background Image Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-image-opaci: Label used for the Community Background Image Opacity Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-image-mode: Label used for the Community Background Mode setting
evelution-designer-community-image-align: Label used for the Community Background Vertical Alignment Theme Designer setting
Label used for the Community Background Horizontal Alignment Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-image-size: Label used for the Community Background Size Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-image-tilin: Label used for Community Background Tiling Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-community-text-color: Label used for the Community Header Text Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-page: Label used for the Page Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-page-text: Label used for the Page Text Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-page-border: Label used for the Page Border background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-anchor: Label used for the Anchor Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-accent: Label used for the Accent Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-sticky-header: Label Sticky Header Background Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-caret: Label used for the Caret Color Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-border-radius: Label used for the Border Radius Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-secondary-font: Label used for the Secondary Font Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-filter: Label used for the Logo Filter Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-filter-hover: Label used for the Logo Filter (Hover) Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-filter-duration: Label used for the Logo Filter Duration Theme Designer setting
evelution-designer-filter-delay: Label used for Logo Filter Delay Theme Designer setting
